Dear ismaya,
 
Warm greetings from Aloft Bali Kuta at Beachwalk! Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share your recent experience, your valuable feedback is indeed sincerely appreciated.

On behalf of the team, I sincerely apologize for failing to meet your expectations. I have addressed this issue with our related team and will ensure to prevent this from happening again in the future.

Thank you again for your feedback. I do hope that this incident will not deter you from visiting us again. At the same time, I am glad to hear that a large number of our staff have helped, and being a good listener, especially Sukur Adiguna, he is thrilled to be recognized by yourself. I can’t thank you enough for recognizing the staff that you personally mentioned.

We sincerely look forward to welcoming you back and providing you with a more satisfying and fun experience the next time you travel to Bali.
 
Regards,
 
Daniel Bartolomeus
Director of Operations

text:
Stay lagi satu malam bersama-sama keluarga di tanggal 5 - 6 Oct 2022 setelah terakhir stay di bulan July 2022.
Memang hotel nya masih terasa baru dan trendy dengan modern design.
Kamar lega dengan 2 single bed yang besar-besar. Bed nya sangat empuk dan nyaman. Kamar bersih dan dingin sangat nyaman. Koneksi Wifi kenceng dan TV sudah type smart ukuran besar 55 inch.
Kolam renang nya cukup nyaman bersih. Breakfast nya sangat enak dan bervariasi. Ada Ice Cream :)

Lokasi sudah paling oke, ada pantai di depan Mall dan Mall tempat nyari makan dan belanja hanya berjarak dekat sekali.

Overall Hotel ini really recommended for family having fun in Kuta area!

text:
Stayed over the weekend with my little family

Here we go;

+ staffs are more like friends, accommodating attitude from security up to their highest position
+ it’s inside Beachwalk Mall, convenient, accessible, efficient
+ breakfast is interesting, the way they display the station and the choices might blew your mind
+ surprisingly the gym is adequately equipped, we’re talking about Aloft, I did not expect it’s exceeded my expectations but it surely did
+ cool thing about the welcome drink, it’s a popsicles! My kid approved! 
+ lobby is like a lounge disguised as a playground, in a positive way, I love it!
+ huge TV which you can utilize to connect to your mobile and listen to your fav vibes.

Now for the things to improve
- if you drive your own car, always remember to get a stamp at reception (because I forgot about it haha) not a bad thing, but served as reminder to you my fellow traveller
- sorry not much I can remember as they stay was short and memorable I supposed.

Special sincere thanks to Mr. Daniel the Hotel Manager, had some talks with him by the restaurants, one of the coolest men in the industry.

I believe we’ll visit soon, as a resident my tip is: if you ever need to go shopping in Beachwalk, stay here, it saves you from the ugly traffic.

Happy Easter folks!
Buzz you up later!
title: a quick pitstop

text:
I really disliked my stay at this hotel.   

The first problem is that the location is very inconvenient.  By the hotel’s description, you’d think the location would be great.  But it’s not.  To get to the hotel you have to walk through the Beachwalk Shopping Mall, which has an unintelligible layout, no maps and completely inadequate signage to direct you to the hotel.  You’d be much better off staying someplace where you can enter directly from the street.

The second big problem is the pool area.  If you think you’ll spend the late afternoon relaxing at the pool, think again.  We came back to the hotel this afternoon to find a “pool party” in full swing — dozens of seemingly random people off the street, ear splitting music and a foam cannon blowing out a heavy stream of foam you have to walk through just to get into the pool.  It’s the most ridiculous scene I’ve ever seen at a Marriott brand hotel.  They may be bringing in the crowds they want, but they’ve lost me.
title: Terrible Location.  No Relaxation at the Pool.

text: This great hotel is located in a bustling area of town, but it's set back far enough to remain very quiet. It features many amenities including toiletries, flip flops, bathrobes, and a 55” TV with YouTube capability. The pool is decently sized and easily accessible. The shower also has a handy ledge that can be used to keep your razor, legs, and other items while shaving. Plus, it is located right next to a shopping center featuring popular stores like Zara, M&S, and Sephora, so you can find some great clothes and plenty of places to eat. All in all, it's great location, great people, and great amenities make this an unbeatable choice.

text:
The Aloft Bali Kuta at Beachwalk is a very new hotel, opened in 2022. The hotel is centrally located and close to the airport.

On arrival we were greeted with the most original check-in, the hotel does not provide you with a boring juice or snack instead they make ice popsicles ! Ice cream as welcome "drink", we loved it !

I booked a room facing the inner side but there were music concerts in the mall. Concerned about the noise I asked if we could have a more quiet room at which they gladly gave us a room facing the outer side.

Our room was quiet, spotlessly clean and off course brand new. 

There is absolutely nothing I could fault the hotel for. Everything is great. The rooms are fantastic and good value for money. The staff really nice, the outdoor pool looked great.

If you do have a room which is facing the inner side noise can be an issue although I believe the mall closes by 22:00 thus after that you shouldn't have any noise either. The great part is that you have a supermarket, restaurants and shops all just below your hotel.
title: Excellent New Clean Hotel

text:
Wanting to try a new hotel and the Marriott group, my choice is Aloft Bali Kuta at Beachwalk. The hotel lobby is lined with access doors to the beachwalk and yello hotels. There are officers and security who help unload goods. The lobby is not too high but wide with blue light shades like in the movies and lots of seats. In the lobby area there is also a billiard, refuel canteen and WXYZ lounge. Fast check-in process. The hotel is not too high but wide and long so if you get a room far from the elevator it's quite a bit of exercise.
The room is actually spacious but because it's full of contents it looks cramped. The mattress is comfortable for sleeping with a size of 140x200 2 pieces with 4 pillows each. There is a sofa bed and coffee table for relaxing or working. The TV is 55 inches in size and the TV service is clear. Wifi is also fast. The room is comfortable because under the bed is also equipped with a carpet so it's not cold when you get off the bed. The interior of the room is not too fancy but very comfortable. We got a one-floor room with a swimming pool but far from the swimming pool so we got a balcony that has access to the garden. For those who need peace, it is not recommended to stay here because the beach walk closes at 22.00 and during that time there is usually music or band events. Anniversary requests are given greeting cards, mirror art and cake slices. For mineral water, 4 glass bottles of 330 ml are provided, tea uses Dilmah, and coffee uses coffee sachets.
The bathroom is standard size and separated between the shower and closet. For towels, 2 body towels and 2 hand towels are provided with standard amenities. For soap and shampoo use a dispenser system. The hot and cold water system is good, equipped with a rain shower with perfect pressure.
For facilities, Aloft provides a gym and pool, but I don't think there's a kids pool. The gym is complete with life fitness brands. Subjectively, I really like Aloft both in Aloft Seminyak and Aloft Kuta because the interior is modern and have youthful vibe, aka contemporary with an industrial touch. Not monotonous interior which only shows luxury. The advantage of Aloft Kuta, of course, is that it has direct access to the beachwalk, making it easy for shopping, eye-catching and looking for food.
Breakfast starts from 06.00-10.30. The variety of food is not too much. If the Marriott group doesn't need to be doubted for breakfast. The taste of the Marriott group breakfast always suits my tongue.
Variant:
1. Muffins, donuts, bread, croissants, Danish, pancakes, waffles, bread butter pudding
2. Traditional snacks and mixed ice
3. Salad, cold cut, sliced fruit, yogurt, cheese
4. Cereals, juices, milk, infused water, salad
5. Jam, topping, ice cream (coconut, chocolate, strawberry)
6. Noodle station and indomie corner
7. Western (beef sausage, sauteed vegetables, baked beans, corn, roasted potatoes)
8. Pork bacon and egg station
9. Porridge and rice jinggo
10. Fried rice, fried noodles, cassava vegetables
My favorite is the coconut ice cream and pork bacon. Checkout can be up to 13.00 and there are no problems.
title: Marriott bonvoy lovers

text:
Our flight back to Australia was cancelled and we ended up needing 2 more nights accommodation in Bali. We were staying at the Sheraton but as the 2 extra nights were an unexpected expense, we thought we'd be a little prudent with money and try a different property for a couple of days... we are so glad we did as the aloft was a fun surprise! 

The rooms are compact but so much thought has gone into how they are appointed they literally have everything you need! You are situated right above beachwalk mall and surrounded by all that Kuta and Legian have to offer- you really only need a place to store your bags and rest your head- which the aloft delivers AND so much more for an excellent price! 

In addition to the brand new, very clever and well designed rooms and the stellar location, theres so much more to love about the Aloft....

 The staff are just fabulous- warm, friendly and so full of personality and are clearly free to be their natural selves at work. They will have a chat to you and have a laugh while being professional and highly attentive!

The XWYZ bar in the lobby is a BRILLIANT place for a drink. Full of atmosphere. Theres games on the tables and a pool table for guests but my favourite spot was at the bar chatting with one of the wonderfully warm and fun staff. You must try one of the amazing house cocktails (the Honky Tonk is a MUST!!) 

The buffet breakfast is fabulous too! Huge variety with all the tropical fruit, yoghurt, hot food and sweet food you'd expect with a decent selection of asian dishes, a noodle bar and an egg bar. Only downside for me was the pancakes and waffles were put out with nothing to keep them warm- if you grab them when they're fresh- delicious and you have numerous toppings for them to choose from including 4 different types of ice cream! 

If you want a clean, comfortable, inviting, smart base to explore Kuta that will deliver excellent value, I cannot reccomend Aloft highly enough!!
title: Location+value= perfect Kuta base!

text:
If you are looking for a great functional hotel in a splendid location (you can walk into the Beachside mall right outside the hotel). This is the largest mall in Bali. Kuta Beach is also just across the road. Everything is within walking distance. No in room dining available but you won't miss it. You can order everything on gojek and have it delivered at the hotel reception. There was a bad smell coming from the toilet but the housekeeping fixed it on complaining. Service is great. Breakfast spread is very nice and you can choose to have their while you stay (to be paid separately).
The gym is also very nice and great to work out.
Also as of now the hotel is very new so everything is super clean and fuctional.
title: Excellent hotel at a great location

text:
I am a calm traveller, I prefer going to hill, mountain or quite village but since my family asked me to get an awesome experience while in buzzling Kuta, I carefully select the best hotel. Aloft Bali Kuta is on my top list, the hotel located inside the shopping center but I feel a different atmosphere. Relaxing yet so trendy. Aloft Bali Kuta surely a place for young people and people young at heart, big tv screen and high tech so you can watch your fave streaming series, speaker so you can sing a long your favorite song for healing once in a while, or just sitting by the pool while entertained by Beachwalk's performer, Beachwalk should inform the performer that their audience not only in the front stage but on top too as we watching from above and a bit sad the performer think nobody's watching ;D.But I love that they support local talents. I should stay longer in Aloft Kuta, so I can watch the live performance at WXYZ bar too.

Our breakfast in DEPOT by aloft is so delicious with so friendly staff, my family fave is bubur ayam and suprisingly got awesome treat from the hand of the Chef himself, chef Danang, he makes my day. Definitely will come back again with the boys as they love it so much ... 

I never thought I will get a different atmostphere in Kuta, but I did. Thanks to all at Aloft who makes my day soooooooo amazing! you know who you are ;) Rock on!
title: Amazing experience finally in Buzzling Kuta!

text:
The hotel just operated for a few weeks when I stayed here and everything still fresh. I love the room design, it’s small but it just works for my 6 night stays. 

The staffs from the reception area, housekeeping, and WXYZ bar are exceptional, they’re always happy and looking forward to help you. 

My only problem is the lack of room service. I had to go down early morning to pick up my suhoor, unlike the similar four-stars hotels where I was staying, they delivered the meal into my room. However, given the timing when they open the hotel, I think they don’t have enough staff yet. 

The excessive use of cardboard food packaging for my suhoor meal also kinda of concerning, I hope you recycled those. 

Last but not least on my last few nights, there was an unpleasant smell coming through the drainage. However thanks to Aris from housekeeping, he manage to get rid of it. 

Regardless those minor issues, I think this hotel should be considered as it has a prime location (mind the noise from the mall next door tho, but they stop around 9-10pm) and great services from all the staffs.
title: Very good staycation!

I got memorable stay at this property. Even do I  stayed for 1 night but all the staff delivered the outstanding service. Starting from the check in process until I'm Out from the hotel. text:
my wife and I stayed here for 3 nights during our last leg or our trip in Bali for our 9 days (march-april 2022) bali trip. 

type of hotel: modern, practical, good choice for  business and holiday trip. 

check in process: smooth

room condition: brand new hotel, super clean, great bed, huge TV, great shower, great aircon, wireless Bluetooth with wireless charging giving additional modern touch of the room.

breakfast: great! during our first breakfast it was a buffet setting, and the selection was fantastic! during our 2nd & 3rd breakfast was ala carte setting, and the food presentation and taste was great. the have fresh fruit juice as well!

hospitality: the highlight of our stay! all staff are super friendly! we couldn't ask for more! 

Location: Great location, it's located in the Beachwalk Shopping Center. just across the shopping center you can go to Kuta beach. 

will i stay here again? definitely yes
title: brand new hotel with great hospitality

text:
SUPER, heel schoon, centraal gelegen bij Kuta Mall. 
Daarbij het meest uitgebreide en variërend ontbijt buffet dat we ooit hebben gezien in Bali; werkelijk alles; een mie-to-go stalletje, uitgebreid warm Indonesisch, uitgebreide egg station, heerlijke verse sappen en fruit, mooie afdeling met lokale sweets en werkelijk za-li-ge capuchino. We hebben genoten. Daarnaast kwamen ze ook nog langs met kruidendrankjes; jamu. Of het werkelijk iets doet weten we niet, maar het was wel authentiek en spicy.
Daarbij waren de kamers super schoon, ruim en modern. Echt heel tevreden, geweldige plek om te verblijven als je in Kuta bent.
title: Ge-wel-dig hotel in centrum Kuta, direct bij Kuta mall, maar toch heel stil

text:
Aloft ist ein modernes und trendiges Hotel. Es wurde im vergrösserten Beachwalk-Einkaufscenter erstellt. Topmodern und alles funktioniert immer noch bestens!
Sehr freundliches und warmes Personal im ganzen Haus.
Zimmer sehr funktionell eingerichtet und auch sehr sauber. 
Frühstücksbuffet ist für ein 4-Stern Hotel sicher sehr gut. Croissants, Kaffee jedesmal frisch von der Kaffeemaschine, Eier in allen Variationen, Eiscreme(!), Fruchtsaft und viel anderes mehr.
Wem es nicht passt, kann runter ins Beachwalk und hat dort die Möglichkeit, viele verschiedene Restaurants aufzusuchen.
Im Shoppingcenter ist auch ein Food Markt vorhanden, wo man alles kaufen kann.
Auch ein kleineres Swimmingpool ist beim Hotel. Zum Strand sind es etwa 200 Meter.
Ein kleineres Problem hatten wir mit dem Internet/WLAN im Hotel, welches sich zweimal verabschiedete. Doch der IT-Service vom Hotel versuchte sein bestes.
Wir können das Aloft nur weiterempfehlen und werden sicher  bald einmal zurückkommen!
title: Ein trendy Hotel über einem Shoppingcenter.
